short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives the option to search highlighted text directly on Youtube, redirecting you to Youtube in another tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight text, right-click and click on "Search on Youtube" to directly open a new tab with what you highlighted searched on Youtube. No need to copy and paste anything!
